title: Learner-Centered Instructional Design Model Application Workshop for Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Tool Utilization Experience and Expertise in Scientific Fields
context.additional_context: Blended learning where medical/legal/technical professionals explore online learning models adaptable to elementary education, conducting project-based assessments in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can develop three types of online science education activities based on learner-centered design principles
Learners can design online learning scenarios integrating motivation, interaction, and personalization strategies
Learners can provide peer feedback on online learning modules using a technology integration evaluation rubric
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
